document_data.name: ''Final Arbiter''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Final Arbiter''''' was an enchanted [[sword]] wielded by Sheikh [[Ardasir al-Darah]] of the [[Jann of the Haunted Lands]].
document_data.Description: ''Final Arbiter'' was a [[great scimitar]]. The hilt was made from pure [[gold]].
document_data.Powers: The sword, combined with Ardasir's great strength, caused massive amounts of physical harm to targets.
